 SetThemeAction ()
virtual ~SetThemeAction ()

Detailed Description

Obsolete - use a simple Action instead and change the theme by overwriting the method Window::OnActionExecuted.

Sets the theme to the theme provided by the constructor or the method Init.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SetThemeAction::SetThemeAction (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.
